related_questions.question:
Simple Present Formula    (+) Subject + to be (am, is, are) + verbl+o/e
- Subject + to be (am, is, are) + pot+verbl+ole
(?) To be (am, is, are) + subject tverbl+o/c
Complete the sentences below with (+), (-) and (?) by looking at the formula above
6. (-) Linda is not a teacher
(Score 15)​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

(+) Linda is a teacher

(?) is Linda a teacher?

Penjelasan:

I hope it can help u,

related_questions.question:
4. Tito is in the library. His hobby is ....    a, singing
b. dancing
c. swimming
d. reading
molluan to the river to​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D. reading

Penjelasan:

4. Tito ada di perpustakaan, hobinya adalah

d. membaca

Jawaban:

d. reading

library= perpustakaan.

Tito is in the library. His hobby is reading.

Tito berada di perpustakaan. Hobinya adalah membaca.

a, singing= bernyanyi

b. dancing= menari

c. swimming= berenang

related_questions.question:
Bludy    Teks for question number 11 to 15
Keisha visited Aunt Vicky last holiday. Aunt vicky brought her to Ancol. It was a beautiful day. Aunt vicky's
daughter, Farah begged Keisha to build a giant sand castle. Keisha took picture their sand castle and uploaded in her
Instagram. Aunt Vicky told her it was too hot to play at the beach without a hat on. Keisha didn't bring her hat. Aunt
Vicky told her not to worry, she could wear one of hers.
Keisha tried on two hats. The pink one was really pretty, but it had a long pink ribbon on its back and it was too big
for her. The blue hat was so fancy but it was too small, it was her niece's hat. Keisha had no other choice, she had to wear
it to avoid the sun light so she chose the pink one. Even though it was too big for her but she didn't care.
Suddenly, there was big wind blew away her hat, her pink hat flew out to the seashore. We laughed at her. She ran away
and tried to catch the hat but it was so hard. She jumped every time the small wave came to her. Finally, she gave up and
let the hat gone away and asked her muin to buy the new one.
11. Where was Keisha?
A. at the hotel
B. at the beach
C. at the castle
D. at aunt vicky's house​

answers.answer:
bludy
Teks for question number 11 to 15
Keisha visited Aunt Vicky last holiday. Aunt vicky brought her to Ancol. It was a beautiful day. Aunt vicky's
daughter, Farah begged Keisha to build a giant sand castle. Keisha took picture their sand castle and uploaded in her
Instagram. Aunt Vicky told her it was too hot to play at the beach without a hat on. Keisha didn't bring her hat. Aunt
Vicky told her not to worry, she could wear one of hers.
Keisha tried on two hats. The pink one was really pretty, but it had a long pink ribbon on its back and it was too big
for her. The blue hat was so fancy but it was too small, it was her niece's hat. Keisha had no other choice, she had to wear
it to avoid the sun light so she chose the pink one. Even though it was too big for her but she didn't care.
Suddenly, there was big wind blew away her hat, her pink hat flew out to the seashore. We laughed at her. She ran away
and tried to catch the hat but it was so hard. She jumped every time the small wave came to her. Finally, she gave up and
let the hat gone away and asked her muin to buy the new one.
11. Where was Keisha?


C. at the castle

Jawaban:

D. at aunt vicky's house

Penjelasan:

Keisha visited Aunt Vicky last holiday.

semoga membantu

related_questions.question: Which includes structure of personal letter​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

privacy, no one knows, always taken and hidden

Penjelasan:

Jadikan jawaban tercerdas:)

Jawaban:

Place and Date of Writing Letter. The place and date of the letter is the most important part of a personal letter. ...

2. Recipient's Address. ...

Include Greeting Words. ...

Opening Paragraph. ...

Letter Contents Section. ...

6. Cover Section. ...

7. Author's Name and Signature.

jadikan jawaban tercedas

Jawaban:

OCTOGENARIAN PROTEST  

Pensioner Maude Jennings I. celebrated her eightieth birthday outside Avonhurst Town yesterday. She was one of a large group who 2. protests against the plans for a tunnel under the River Severn. Maude's tiny cottage may 3. be demolished when new roads to the tunnel 4. are built. Maude was born in the cottage, which 5. was built in the 18th century, and the entrance of the tunnel will be built at the ends of her garden. Maude /. consulted our reporter, 'I 8. have been told by the planners, and I 9. will never leave my lovely home. I 10. have lived there for eighty years!  

Penjelasan:

Jawaban dicetak tebal dan menggunakan bentuk Simple Past Tense, Simple Present Tense, Present Perfect Tense, Simple Future Tense, Modal Verbs dan Passive Voice.

Simple Past Tense:

Nominal: (+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Adjective

Verbal: (+) Subject + Verb-2 + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Tobe (was/were) + Verb-3

Simple Present Tense:

Verbal: (+) Subject + Verb-1 S/ES + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Tobe (is/am/are) + Verb-3

Present Perfect Tense

(+) Subject + Have/Has + Verb-3

Simple Future Tense:

(+) Subject + Will + Verb-1 + Object

Modal Verbs:

Active: (+) Subject + Modal Verbs (May/Will) + Verb-1 + Object

Passive: (+) Subject + Modal Verbs (May/Will) + Be + Verb-3

Semoga membantu ya.
